title: [1.7~1.8][128x]塞尔达传说 - Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time 3DS
author: 西木凛
txt_content:
本帖最后由 西木凛 于 2015-2-3 14:55 编辑 

Legend of Zelda Ocarina of Time 3DS
I am currently in the making of a 3DS resourcepack from the remake of Ocarina of Time, This is also planned to go along with my Ocarina of Time map xEyelessx is also working on! This pack is in an early state currently and is not complete. but i wanted to release it now so I can get it out of the way so there is an actual texturepack of the game. Anyways enjoy!
 Ocarina of Time
这个材质包虽然暂未完善，但还是可以享受这个材质。点我传送Ocarina of Time 百度百科点我传送时之笛-百度图片



这个材质包有点注重于写实玻璃/羊毛/草地都做得挺好看的如果你要喜欢做峡谷类型的建筑！我推荐你使用这款材质！
